name: Backfire (itch) (Anurag1212)
description:
A 2.5D  tank shoot out game but what if there are no controls🤨🤨??

This game was developed by me and my friend Rahul in 48 hours for GMTK game jam 2020. The theme for the jam was "OUT OF CONTROL". This was our second game as duo and probably third game as a indie developer.

Instructions :

Right click to aim.

Left click to shoot.

that's it or is it?🤭🤭
